text: (napiye!) Nanmai (varuvatarku) munnar, timaiyaik kontu (varumaru) um'mai ivarkal avacarappatuttukirarkal; niccayamaka ivarkalukku munnarum (vetanai mikka tantanaikal valankappatta utaranamana) nikalccikal natanteyirukkinran niccayamaka um iraivan manitarkalai avarkalin pavankalukkaka mannippavanakavum irukkinran; melum, um iraivan niccayamaka vetanai ceyvatilum katumaiyanavanaka irukkinran
